ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes but for those who do not get dual wield, bash is a good thing with a shield, especially if it is a magic shield.  This will allow a 2nd magical attack.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes but for those who do not get dual wield, bash is a good thing
with a shield, especially if it is a magic shield. This will allow
a 2nd magical attack.


Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Mifsud, Michael[SMTP:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 7:40 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Bash is slam with a shield. It is a replacement for slam for the races
> that dont get slam. If you have slam I would not bother with bash and go
> two-handed.
>
> Jaade,
> Indigo Sista Soldier.
>
>
> > ----------
> > From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:10 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
> >
> > From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
> >
> > What is the difference between Slam and Bash? I have been bashing
> > everyone
> > like crazy trying to get it up to the same level as my kick, and now I
> > find
> > out that I might be wasting my time. I am a Barbarian Princess, so
> > slamming
> > people around is right in my league, but just what is the difference?
> >
> > For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
